body: I'm really loving this artist, he knows what I want to see. So many others don't really show the couple together, just the girl getting it on with a free floating disembodied cock. While I don't mind the POV sometimes I really rather see their two bodies entwined in their love making.

Hmm, awesome to color version of these chapters. I hope we can see more of it. Yep, it's always the guy in the spotlight that can cum most. I wonder how many times he came. 4, 5 or 6? Doesn't matter anyway. The chapter were lovely, mmm.
Can colourised versions be banned?? They almost always look god-awful :/
